OOC: One other thing Tankor- you might want to bear in
mind with this scene, that Ratrap is Shadowcaster's
son and that he has just come back from the Matrix
after sacrificing his life to save everyone at the
Battle of the Nemesis.

 --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
OOC: Tankor Shadowcaster is in other room, He's using
a sort of 
telepaty

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Tankor
<lordofdarkness11001@y...> 
wrote:
> BlackArachnia/Rattrap/Rhinox/Optimus Primal
>  
> Blackarachnia: " Holy. That big bot looks just like
Shadowcaster"
>  
> Rattrap " i think your right"
>  
> The four go to the mess hall.
>  
> Rattrap " shadowcaster is that you?
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlight:::
> 
> "So..."though the femme"YOu can know what I'm
thinking... what can 
> others think...?"
> Nighlight thought what would happen if she could
know what happned 
> in others minds, she looked her little daughter and
she smiled... 
> what could Elita think about her about all things
that happens 
> around her?
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
<cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > Shadowcaster was taken aback. It looks like this
was
> > the real deal. "Well looks like this IS real.
Wierd!
> > seems like somehow I've become telepathic. What I
sent
> > to you is true though."
> > 
> >  --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Nighlight::
> > 
> > "The other side"though confused the femme but she
> > pressed the 
> > comlink 3 as Shadimus asked
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > Shadimus found this interesting, was this
> > Nightlight's
> > > vioce he was hearing- had he developed the
ability
> > to
> > > commune with other sparks? There was only one
way to
> > > know for sure.
> > > 
> > > "Just call me your friendly neighbourhood
ancient
> > > Cybertronian." he sent with a wink. "Don't ask
me
> > how
> > > this is happening if it really is, but maybe it
has
> > to
> > > do with me coming back from the other side. I
need
> > > proof- if this is really happening, quickly turn
on
> > > and off your comm link 3."
> > > 
> > > Shadowcaster waited for a reply.
> > > 
> > >  --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> > > ---------------------------------
> > > Nighlight::
> > > 
> > > "Who???? How???"Nighlight thought, she only knew
> > that
> > > only a bot 
> > > could contact sparks and she tought that.. no he
> > > wasn't he couldn't 
> > > be; his spark once kind and warn was become
evil...
> > > so, who was?? 
> > > before that she could tought more a warn and
> > > conforting feeling 
> > > sorround her and she started to feel comforted.
She
> > > thought "Who're 
> > > you?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> > > <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > > > Shadowcaster could sense something was wrong
with
> > > one
> > > > of the crew, something which while not greatly
> > > > troubling him, gave him cause to question just
> > what
> > > > coming back from the martrix can do to the
spark
> > of
> > > a
> > > > Transformer.
> > > > 
> > > > 'Is this what happens to bots who come back
from
> > the
> > > > other side?' he thought to himself.
> > > > 
> > > > Drawing on zen meditation techniques which
he'd
> > > > downloaded during one trip to earth during the
> > great
> > > > war, Shadowcaster let himself relax, letting
the
> > > > sensation take hold, before focusing on where
it
> > > might
> > > > be coming from, the vague details becoming
more
> > > > specific, until he finally had a clear picture
in
> > > his
> > > > mind of who it was and what was going on.
> > > > 
> > > > Reaching through the matrix directly to her
spark,
> > > he
> > > > started to comfort her.
> > > > 
> > > > "You, know, as long as we have those around us
who
> > > > love usw and care about us, we are never truly
> > > alone."
> > > > 
> > > > At the same time, he sent her reassuring
feelings
> > > that
> > > > se was loved and cared about.
> > > 
> > > 
> > >
